    | text      = a very dark room where she conducted her seances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:37.960
    | text      = In 1928, a photographer named Harvey Metcalf showed up to a seance and took some flash
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:42.100
    | text      = photographs of these ghosts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:43.299
    | text      = Oh, I bet it didn't work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:44.539
    | text      = They were very clearly crudely constructed papier-mâché masks covered in a sheet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:52.100
    | text      = Just covered in a sheet?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:53.100
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:54.100
    | text      = Somehow this revelation did not destroy Helen's business model and she continued running seances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.899
    | text      = Anybody can fake photographs, Dan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:59.820
    | text      = Ah, totally.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:00.820
    | text      = Anybody can fake those.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:01.820
    | text      = So about that ectoplasm, in 1931, the London Spiritualist Academy started to have some
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:06.279
    | text      = questions about Helen's methods.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:08.139
    | text      = I would imagine that they were thinking, like, hey, this person can do things that literally
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:11.860
    | text      = no one else can do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:12.860
    | text      = I wonder what's up with that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:14.120
    | text      = And so they opened an examination into her gifts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:17.340
    | text      = Very quickly they were able to determine that the way Helen produced ectoplasm was by ingesting
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.139
    | text      = a bunch of cheesecloth and throwing it back up performatively.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:24.779
    | text      = The room was dark and sometimes she would lock herself in a cabinet when producing the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.299
    | text      = ectoplasm.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:30.299
    | text      = Quote, the most usual method for ectoplasm, however, seemed to be butter, mucilin, or
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:33.860
    | text      = cheesecloth, probably swallowed and regurgitated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:36.980
    | text      = Distressing choking noises were sometimes heard from within the cabinet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:40.419
    | text      = Because she couldn't throw it up so she was putting her finger down her mouth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.940
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:44.940
    | text      = Gotcha.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:45.940
    | text      = She hid in a cabinet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:46.940
    | text      = Man, they used to give people a lot of the benefit of the doubt on these.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:50.080
    | text      = So much.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.080
    | text      = That is a crazy amount of benefit of the doubt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.340
    | text      = So now I'm going to produce this magical stuff but I have to go make throw up noises in this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.419
    | text      = closet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:57.419
    | text      = Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:58.419
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:59.419
    | text      = Oh, I'm going to be invisible but just don't look.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:00.419
    | text      = Like, fucking, what are you doing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:02.080
    | text      = It's pretty crazy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:03.220
    | text      = So once they figured out that this was probably how Helen was doing her trick, they decided
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:06.539
    | text      = to test their hypothesis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:08.299
    | text      = Their most surprising piece of evidence that Helen was full of shit was when they talked
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.620
    | text      = to her...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:12.620
    | text      = When she literally shit out the cheesecloth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:13.620
    | text      = So they talked her into ingesting a blue food dye pill before a performance, which would
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:18.419
    | text      = naturally dye the cheesecloth she'd already swallowed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:20.940
    | text      = Of course.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:21.940
    | text      = Which would make everything crystal clear.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:23.159
    | text      = For some weird reason, she was unable to produce ectoplasm that night.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.460
    | text      = Mysterious.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:27.460
    | text      = Odd.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:28.460
    | text      = She generally produced it all the time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:30.139
    | text      = Every time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.139
    | text      = So let's see...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.139
    | text      = Look, everybody has a bad set, man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:33.139
    | text      = Like, sometimes the ant's still alive, sometimes you can't produce ectoplasm on the one night
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.899
    | text      = where it seems imperative that you do so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:39.000
    | text      = Even the best comics bomb.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:40.419
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:41.419
    | text      = Wait, so, the spiritualist society.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:44.419
    | text      = Were they, like, believing in spiritualism or were they like, let's not do the spiritualism
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.940
    | text      = thing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:50.940
    | text      = Or the academy or whatever the fuck it was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.940
    | text      = From my understanding is they were on board but also wanted, like, trust but verify kind
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:56.059
    | text      = of thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.059
    | text      = I don't, again, no heroes here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:59.059
    | text      = Well, I mean, I think the fact that they were, like, holed on means that they're at least
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:03.899
    | text      = on the right side of things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.340
    | text      = Maybe not heroes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:06.340
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:07.340
    | text      = Benign actors.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:08.340
    | text      = Well, I was actually thinking about this in terms of the ectoplasm and manifesting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:14.220
    | text      = Like I am far more believing of people who are like, oh, well, I can communicate to the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:21.279
    | text      = other space.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:22.279
    | text      = Because fucking fine, there's multiple dimensions or whatever.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.100
    | text      = I don't, I mean, it's obviously not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:27.139
    | text      = You draw a weird line.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:28.139
    | text      = No, it's obviously not true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:29.659
    | text      = But when you start getting into physical stuff, then you start having to talk about actual
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:34.580
    | text      = physics.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:35.580
    | text      = Like this is why ghosts don't exist because there would have to be a particle that makes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.419
    | text      = ghosts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:40.419
    | text      = Meh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:41.419
    | text      = It has to be something that can interact with the physical world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:43.500
    | text      = That's foolish, closed-minded thinking.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.039
    | text      = And so if you're producing manifestations, man, that breaks all the laws of physics and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:50.500
    | text      = every single scientist would descend upon you if this even had the width of truth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.220
    | text      = Well, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:57.220
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:58.220
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:59.220
    | text      = I mean, to some extent that's true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:00.220
    | text      = Because she could break the simple law of matter cannot be created or destroyed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:05.859
    | text      = Everything is out the window once this lady throws up some cheesecloth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.420
    | text      = The entire world is forever changed and we understand nothing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:13.980
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:14.980
    | text      = So in 1931, that same year, this guy named Harry Price, the director of the National
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.940
    | text      = Laboratory of Physical Research paid Helen to run some tests on her seances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:24.180
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:25.180
    | text      = And he took a sample of her ectoplasm to definitively show that it was cheesecloth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.380
    | text      = Why would she let him do that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:29.779
    | text      = It's weird, but also this passage from his report is maybe one of my favorite things
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:35.059
    | text      = I've read about one of these con people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:38.140
    | text      = This is from his report on one of the seances.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.819
    | text      = Quote, at the conclusion of the fourth seance, we led the medium to a settee and called for
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:45.740
    | text      = the apparatus.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:47.059
    | text      = At the sight of it, the lady promptly went into a trance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:49.900
    | text      = She recovered but refused to be x-rayed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:52.160
    | text      = Her husband went up to her and told her that it was painless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:54.660
    | text      = She jumped up and gave him a smashing blow to the face, which sent him reeling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.539
    | text      = Then she...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:00.539
    | text      = You shut the fuck up!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:01.539
    | text      = You shut the fuck up!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:02.539
    | text      = I'm not getting to that x-ray!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:03.539
    | text      = She just punched...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:04.539
    | text      = She just whammed him!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:05.539
    | text      = Yeah, just punches her husband.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:12.279
    | text      = As a woman in the 20s or the 30s or whatever?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:15.579
    | text      = But also the husband was in on the scam, obviously, and knew like, I got to play along with this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:20.579
    | text      = She can hit me if she wants.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:22.140
    | text      = So then she went for Dr. William Brown, who was present.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:25.619
    | text      = He dodged the blow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:27.019
    | text      = Miss Duncan, without the slightest warning, dashed out into the street, had an attack
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:30.160
    | text      = of hysteria, and began to tear her seance garment to pieces.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.819
    | text      = She clutched the railings and screamed and screamed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:36.059
    | text      = Her husband tried to pacify her.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:37.579
    | text      = It was useless.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:38.579
    | text      = I leave the reader to visualize the scene.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:40.619
    | text      = A 17-stone woman, clad in black sateen tights, locked to the railing, screaming at the top
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:45.299
    | text      = of her voice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:46.299
    | text      = A crowd collected and the police arrived.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:48.859
    | text      = The medical men with us explained the position and prevented him from fetching an ambulance.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:52.779
    | text      = We got her back into the laboratory, and at once she demanded to be x-rayed.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:56.380
    | text      = In reply, Dr. William Brown turned to Mr. Duncan and asked him to turn out his pockets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:00.960
    | text      = He refused and would not allow us to search him.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:03.380
    | text      = There's no question that his wife had passed him the cheesecloth in the street.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.819
    | text      = Nice!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:07.819
    | text      = However, they gave us another seance, and the control said we could cut off a piece
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:13.339
    | text      = of teleplasm when it appeared.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:15.960
    | text      = The sight of half a dozen men, each with a pair of scissors waiting for the word, was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:19.539
    | text      = amusing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:20.539
    | text      = It came and we all jumped.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:22.019
    | text      = One of the doctors got a hold of the stuff and secured a piece.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:24.559
    | text      = The medium screamed and the rest of the teleplasm went down her throat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:29.259
    | text      = This time, it wasn't cheesecloth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.980
    | text      = It proved to be paper, soaked in egg white, and folded into a flattened tube.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:35.420
    | text      = Could anything be more infantile than a group of grown men wasting time, money, and energy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:39.720
    | text      = on the antics of a fat female crook?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:42.180
    | text      = He did not need to throw the fat part in there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:45.779
    | text      = No, that's a little-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.779
    | text      = That's cruelty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:47.779
    | text      = That is cruel.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:48.779
    | text      = That's a little rude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:49.779
    | text      = Look, adding insult to injury is not necessary, do you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.779
    | text      = It's very rude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:54.779
    | text      = Unnecessary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:55.779
    | text      = But it is 1931.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:56.779
    | text      = I was going to say, when you said 17th stone, also it did help, though, that he called her
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:00.319
    | text      = fat because I was like, 17th stone, is that a lot or is that a little?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:03.180
    | text      = We're not used to these measurements.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:04.180
    | text      = Is that a good amount?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:05.180
    | text      = Is that- what's the BMI on stone?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:07.799
    | text      = But I love the idea that in his report, he's talking about how fucking humorous that scene
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:11.740
    | text      = is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.740
    | text      = And the fact that immediately they knew that, like, oh, you faked an attack of some sort
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:18.339
    | text      = in order to cover for your, like, passing off of the evidence.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:22.779
    | text      = So-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:23.779
    | text      = Excuse me, ma'am.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:24.779
    | text      = We have seen sleight of hand before, so could you not?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:28.220
    | text      = Yeah, that one's simple to call.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
